vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to cast, shoot, hurl
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to throw
1a2) bow-shooters, bowmen (participle)
1b) (Piel) to throw down
Aramaic equivalent: re.mah (רְמָא "to cast" H7412)
§ 1) to cast, shoot, hurl
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to throw
1a2) bow-shooters, bowmen (participle)
1b) (Piel) to throw down
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (b) qal   disparar (con un arco); (c) pi.   engañar, traicionar
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 丟, 射擊, 用力投擲
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 丟
1a2) 射手, 手箭手 (分詞)
2) 騙取, 欺騙, 誤導, 奸詐對待
2a) (Piel)
2a1) 騙取, 狡詐, 欺騙, 詭計
2a2) 不忠誠地對待, 背叛
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 丢, 射击, 用力投掷
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 丢
1a2) 射手, 手箭手 (分词)
2) 骗取, 欺骗, 误导, 奸诈对待
2a) (Piel)
2a1) 骗取, 狡诈, 欺骗, 诡计
2a2) 不忠诚地对待, 背叛

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to beguile, deceive, mislead, deal treacherously
1a) (Piel)
1a1) to beguile, deceive, mislead, trick
1a2) to deal treacherously with, betray
§ 1) to beguile, deceive, mislead, deal treacherously
1a) (Piel)
1a1) to beguile, deceive, mislead, trick
1a2) to deal treacherously with, betray
